verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I would have a part with Thee,
Precious Lord, wash over me,
Wash away all the stains
Till in my heart Your love reigns,
Wash over me, wash over me,
Wash over me, wash over me.
Wash over me, Water of Life,
Make me clean in Your sight,
Remove the stains of the past
Till clean and fresh I'll be at last,
Wash over me, wash over me,
Wash over me, wash over me.
